code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"../styles/BannerSlider.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BannerSlider=()=>{const[currentSlide,setCurrentSlide]=useState(0);const slides=[{image:"/first-bannerimage.png"},{image:"/second-bannerimage.jpg"},{image:"/third-bannerimage.jpg"}];useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentSlide(prev=>(prev+1)%slides.length);},5000);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[slides.length]);const goPrev=()=>setCurrentSlide(prev=>(prev-1+slides.length)%slides.length);const goNext=()=>setCurrentSlide(prev=>(prev+1)%slides.length);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"banner-slider",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider-container",children:[slides.map((slide,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-slide ".concat(currentSlide===index?"active":""),style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(slide.image,")")}},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"slider-prev",onClick:goPrev,children:"\u2039"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"slider-next",onClick:goNext,children:"\u203A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-dots",children:slides.map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dot ".concat(currentSlide===index?"active":""),onClick:()=>setCurrentSlide(index),"aria-label":"Go to slide ".concat(index+1)},index))})]})});};export default BannerSlider;
